brief_summary.textblock:
Th purpose of this study is to determine whether dual psychological and pharmacological
      treatment is superior to either mono-therapy alone in the treatment of postnatal depression.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomised Trial of Sertraline, Cognitive Behaviour Therapy & Combined Therapy for Postnatal Depression
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Controlled Evaluation of Sertraline, Cognitive Behaviour Therapy & Combined Therapy for Postnatal Depression

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
